00028 void BrowseForDNSSDService::InitZeroconfSubsystem( bool FromConstructor )
00029 {
00030 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00031     // Nothing to do
00032 #else
00033 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00034     if ( FromConstructor == false )
00035     {
00036         // Free everything active in inverse order of allocation
00037         if ( AvahiBrowser != (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL )
00038         {
00039             avahi_service_browser_free( AvahiBrowser );
00040         }
00041 
00042         if ( AvahiConnection != (AvahiClient *)NULL )
00043         {
00044             avahi_client_free(AvahiConnection);
00045         }
00046 
00047         /* WE DO NOT unitialized nothing because it always crash
00048            will see with avahi dev members to check what happens
00049            As we have only one instance of this in UserFriendlyMode
00050            it is not a real problem
00051 
00052         // Not done to prevent Avahi crash (better but still crash some times)
00053         if ( AvahiPoll != (AvahiSimplePoll *)NULL )
00054         {
00055                 avahi_simple_poll_quit( AvahiPoll );
00056                 avahi_simple_poll_free( AvahiPoll );
00057         } */
00058     }
00059 
00060     AvahiPoll = (AvahiSimplePoll *)NULL;
00061     AvahiConnection = (AvahiClient *)NULL;
00062     AvahiBrowser = (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL;
00063 #endif
00064 #endif
00065 }

00097 BrowseForDNSSDService::~BrowseForDNSSDService()

00105 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00106 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00107     uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *fullname, const char *hosttarget, uint16_t port,
00108     uint16_t txtLen, const unsigned char *txtRecord, void *context )
00109 {
00110     if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00111         return;
00112 
00113     SimpleString FullName;
00114     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)context;
00115 
00116     FullName = fullname;
00117     FullName.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
00118 
00119     DnsSdService ServiceInfo( FullName, ntohs(port), hosttarget );
00120     ServiceInfo.Properties.ImportTXTRecord( txtLen, txtRecord );
00121 
00122     // Add ServiceShortName as PeerId in a pseudo variable
00123     ServiceInfo.Properties[CommonServiceValues::NameForPeerIdString] = "c/" + ServiceInfo.Name;
00124 
00125     MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, flags | OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd );
00126 }
00127 
00128 
00129 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply( DNSServiceRef sdRef, DNSServiceFlags flags,
00130     uint32_t interfaceIndex, DNSServiceErrorType errorCode, const char *serviceName, const char *replyType,
00131     const char *replyDomain, void *context )
00132 {
00133     if ( errorCode != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00134     {
00135         return;
00136     }
00137 
00138     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)context;
00139 
00140     if ( flags & OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd )
00141     {
00142         // A new service in the list, resolve it to see if it is the searched one...
00143         DNSServiceRef Ref;
00144 
00145         if ( DNSServiceResolve( &Ref, 0, interfaceIndex, serviceName, replyType, replyDomain, (DNSServiceResolveReply)SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply, context ) == kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00146         {
00147             DNSServiceProcessResult( Ref );
00148             DNSServiceRefDeallocate( Ref );
00149         }
00150     }
00151     else
00152     {
00153         DnsSdService ServiceInfo( serviceName, replyType, replyDomain, 1 );
00154         MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, flags );
00155     }
00156 }
00157 #else
00158 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00159 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply( AvahiServiceResolver *r,
00160     AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiIfIndex interface, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiProtocol protocol, AvahiResolverEvent event,
00161     const char *name, const char *type, const char *domain, const char *host_name, const AvahiAddress *address,
00162     uint16_t port, AvahiStringList *txt, AvahiLookupResultFlags flags, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED void* userdata)
00163 {
00164     if ( r == (AvahiServiceResolver *)NULL )
00165     {
00166         return;
00167     }
00168 
00169     /* Called whenever a service has been resolved successfully or timed out */
00170     switch (event)
00171     {
00172         case AVAHI_RESOLVER_FAILURE:
00173             OmiscidError( "AvahiResolver Failed to resolve service '%s' of type '%s' in domain '%s': %s\n", name, type, domain, avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(avahi_service_resolver_get_client(r))));
00174             break;
00175 
00176         case AVAHI_RESOLVER_FOUND:
00177             {
00178                 SimpleString FullName;
00179                 BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)userdata;
00180                 TemporaryMemoryBuffer MemForTxtRecord(8*1024);  // DNS-SD specification say that 8000 is max
00181 
00182                 FullName = name;
00183                 FullName.ReplaceAll( "\\032", " " );
00184                 FullName += ".";
00185                 FullName += type;
00186                 FullName += ".";
00187                 FullName += host_name;  // empirically host_name contains .local. in case of local domain
00188                 if ( strcmp( domain, "local" ) == 0 )
00189                 {
00190                     FullName += ".";
00191                 }
00192 
00193                 // Avahi port are not in network order !!!!
00194                 DnsSdService ServiceInfo( FullName, port, host_name );
00195 
00196                 // Add Txt record data
00197                 size_t SizeOfTxtRecord = avahi_string_list_serialize( txt, (void*)MemForTxtRecord, (size_t)MemForTxtRecord.GetLength() );
00198                 if ( SizeOfTxtRecord > (size_t)0 )
00199                 {
00200                     ServiceInfo.Properties.ImportTXTRecord( (int)SizeOfTxtRecord, (const unsigned char*)MemForTxtRecord );
00201                     // Remove  avahi flag because it will let Omiscid thing that we need to connect to
00202                     // the service
00203                     ServiceInfo.Properties.Undefine( "org.freedesktop.Avahi.cookie" );
00204                 }
00205 
00206                 // Add ServiceShortName as PeerId in a pseudo variable
00207                 ServiceInfo.Properties[CommonServiceValues::NameForPeerIdString] = "c/" + ServiceInfo.Name;
00208 
00209                 MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, OmiscidDNSServiceFlagsAdd );
00210             }
00211             break;
00212     }
00213 
00214     // Free the resolver
00215     avahi_service_resolver_free(r);
00216 }
00217 
00218 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply( AvahiServiceBrowser *b,
00219     AvahiIfIndex interface, AvahiProtocol protocol, AvahiBrowserEvent event, const char *name, const char *type,
00220     const char *domain, AVAHI_GCC_UNUSED AvahiLookupResultFlags flags, void* userdata)
00221 {
00222     BrowseForDNSSDService * MyThis = (BrowseForDNSSDService *)userdata;
00223 
00224     if ( b == (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL )
00225     {
00226         return;
00227     }
00228 
00229     /* Called whenever a new services becomes available on the LAN or is removed from the LAN */
00230     switch (event)
00231     {
00232         case AVAHI_BROWSER_FAILURE:
00233             OmiscidError( "AvahiBrowser %s\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(avahi_service_browser_get_client(b))));
00234             avahi_simple_poll_quit(MyThis->AvahiPoll);
00235             return;
00236 
00237         case AVAHI_BROWSER_NEW:
00238             /* We ignore the returned resolver object. In the callback
00239                function we free it. If the server is terminated before
00240                the callback function is called the server will free
00241                the resolver for us. */
00242 
00243             if ( avahi_service_resolver_new(MyThis->AvahiConnection, interface, protocol, name, type, domain, AVAHI_PROTO_UNSPEC, (AvahiLookupFlags)0,
00244                         SearchCallBackDNSServiceResolveReply, (void*)MyThis) == NULL )
00245             {
00246                 OmiscidError( "AvahiBrowser failed to resolve service name='%s' type='%s': %s\n", name, type, avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(MyThis->AvahiConnection)));
00247                 avahi_simple_poll_quit(MyThis->AvahiPoll);
00248             }
00249             break;
00250 
00251         case AVAHI_BROWSER_REMOVE:
00252             {
00253                 DnsSdService ServiceInfo( name, type, domain, 1 );
00254                 MyThis->CallbackClient( ServiceInfo, 0 );
00255             }
00256             break;
00257 
00258         case AVAHI_BROWSER_ALL_FOR_NOW:
00259         case AVAHI_BROWSER_CACHE_EXHAUSTED:
00260             break;
00261     }
00262 }
00263 
00264 #endif
00265 #endif
00266 
00267 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE BrowseForDNSSDService::Run()
00268 {
00269 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_MDNS
00270 
00271     ::timeval timeout;
00272     fd_set fds;
00273     int nReady;
00274     int MaxDesc = 0;    // Maximal descriptor for the select function
00275     DNSServiceRef Ref;
00276     SOCKET DNSSocket;
00277 
00278     if ( DNSServiceBrowse(&Ref,0,0,RegType.GetStr(),"",SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply,this) != kDNSServiceErr_NoError )
00279     {
00280         return;
00281     }
00282 
00283     DNSSocket = DNSServiceRefSockFD( Ref );
00284 
00285     while(!StopPending())
00286     {
00287         // Set the fd set to an empty set
00288         FD_ZERO(&fds);
00289         FD_SET( DNSSocket, &fds );
00290 
00291         // Set or reset the timeout value (select may have change it)
00292         timeout.tv_sec = 0;
00293         timeout.tv_usec = 10000;        // 10 ms
00294 
00295 #ifndef WIN32
00296         MaxDesc = DNSSocket + 1;
00297 #else
00298         // On WIN32 plateform, the value is unused and remain 0
00299 #endif
00300 
00301         nReady = select(MaxDesc, &fds, NULL, NULL, &timeout);
00302 
00303         // If our only socket is readable...
00304         if ( nReady > 0 )
00305         {
00306             // ... process the result
00307             DNSServiceProcessResult(Ref);
00308         }
00309     }
00310 
00311     DNSServiceRefDeallocate( Ref );
00312 #else
00313 #ifdef OMISCID_USE_AVAHI
00314     AvahiPoll = avahi_simple_poll_new();
00315     if ( AvahiPoll == (AvahiSimplePoll *)NULL )
00316     {
00317         OmiscidError( "Could not create poll\n" );
00318         return;
00319     }
00320 
00321     int error;
00322 
00323     AvahiConnection = avahi_client_new( avahi_simple_poll_get(AvahiPoll), (AvahiClientFlags)0, NULL, (void*)this, &error );
00324     if ( AvahiConnection == (AvahiClient *)NULL )
00325     {
00326         InitZeroconfSubsystem( false );
00327         OmiscidError( "Could not create client %s\n", avahi_strerror(error) );
00328         return;
00329     }
00330 
00331     // Create the service browser
00332     AvahiBrowser = avahi_service_browser_new(AvahiConnection, AVAHI_IF_UNSPEC, AVAHI_PROTO_UNSPEC, RegType.GetStr(), NULL, (AvahiLookupFlags)0, SearchCallBackDNSServiceBrowseReply, (void*)this);
00333     if ( AvahiBrowser == (AvahiServiceBrowser *)NULL )
00334     {
00335         InitZeroconfSubsystem( false );
00336         OmiscidError( "Failed to create service browser: %s\n", avahi_strerror(avahi_client_errno(AvahiConnection)));
00337         return;
00338     }
00339 
00340     while(!StopPending())
00341     {
00342         // Call everything for avahi and go out every 10 ms
00343         if ( avahi_simple_poll_iterate( AvahiPoll, 10 ) != 0 )
00344         {
00345             // Ok, problem or quit asked, exit thread
00346             break;
00347         }
00348     }
00349 #endif
00350 #endif
00351 }
00352 
00353 void BrowseForDNSSDService::Start()
00354 {
00355     if ( ! IsRunning() )
00356     {
00357         StartThread();
00358     }
00359 }
00360 
00361 void BrowseForDNSSDService::CallbackClient(DnsSdService& DnsSdService, const unsigned int flags )
00362 {
00363     if ( CallBack != NULL )
00364     {
00365         CallBack( DnsSdService, flags, UserData );
00366     }
00367 }
